jd: From: Tushar Chauhan, CCIT tushar@ccitinc.com Reply to: tushar@ccitinc.com Hello,Please find the job description of Technical Lead (Azure for Concordia Plans)Job Title: Technical Lead (Azure for Concordia Plans)Duration: Long Term ContractLocation: Onsite (St. Louis, MO)Job Description:Position SummaryWe are seeking an experienced Technical Lead - Azure to spearhead the design, development, and deployment of Azure-based solutions across Concordia Plans. This role will be pivotal in managing cloud transformation initiatives, ensuring high-quality solutions that align with organizational goals. The Technical Lead will work closely with cross-functional teams, including infrastructure, security, and application teams, to build secure, scalable, and efficient cloud-based solutions.Key ResponsibilitiesAzure Cloud Architecture & Design: Lead the design of Azure-based solutions, ensuring they are scalable, resilient, and aligned with best practices and industry standards.Solution Implementation: Oversee and actively participate in the development and deployment of cloud-based applications, services, and integrations.Project Management: Collaborate with stakeholders to define project scope, timelines, and deliverables, managing resources and tracking project progress to ensure timely delivery.Cloud Governance & Security: Implement best practices for cloud governance and security, including identity management, data protection, and compliance with industry standards.Technical Leadership: Serve as a technical advisor for the Azure platform, guiding development teams on best practices, reviewing code, and ensuring adherence to design principles.Performance Optimization: Monitor and optimize Azure infrastructure, improving efficiency, scalability, and cost-effectiveness.Automation & DevOps: Promote DevOps methodologies, implement CI/CD pipelines, and automate infrastructure provisioning using tools such as Terraform, Azure DevOps, or ARM templates.Mentorship: Mentor and coach team members, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing.Required Skills and ExperienceProven Expertise in Azure: 5+ years of experience designing, implementing, and managing solutions in Azure, including proficiency in Azure compute, storage, networking, and database services.Technical Leadership: Demonstrated experience leading technical teams in cloud environments, especially Azure, including code reviews, solution design, and architectural guidance.Azure DevOps & Automation: Strong experience with DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure automation tools such as Terraform, ARM, or Azure CLI.Security Best Practices: Strong understanding of cloud security best practices, including Azure security services (Azure AD, Key Vault, Security Center), identity management, and data protection.Coding & Scripting: Proficiency in programming languages such as PowerShell, Python, or .NET, with an emphasis on automation and integration.Project Management: Excellent project management skills, capable of managing resources, setting priorities, and meeting project deadlines.Analytical & Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to troubleshoot complex issues in cloud environments, applying both analytical and creative approaches to deliver efficient solutions.Excellent Communication Skills: Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.Preferred QualificationsAzure Certifications: Azure Solutions Architect Expert, Azure DevOps Engineer, or other relevant certifications.Experience with Hybrid Cloud Environments: Experience managing hybrid cloud solutions, integrating on-premises systems with cloud environments.Database Management: Knowledge of Azure SQL, Cosmos DB, or other cloud-native databases.Experience in Agile/Scrum Environments: Familiarity with Agile project management frameworks, including Scrum or Kanban. Thanks & RegardsTushar Chauhantushar@ccitinc.com+1 (248)301-2788
